title: Laszlo Moholy-Nagy Design Help
content: Hi, I'm doing a typography exhibition project for my class. I'm doing it on Laszlo Moholy-Nagy and my concept is his aerial perspective photography. I'm having trouble designing these posters. I'm supposes to design 3 posters as a series. Can anyone please help me and give suggestions if you can? Thank you very much.
author: jensterz

comments.content:
Is it too late to help with this?   
   
Tell me a little more about the objective of your project. Typography posters around a photography concept?   
   
-Addison
